description.en: LISTEN.moe is a fan-made website that aims to to play Anime/Japanese/Doujin music 24/7
description.pt_BR: LISTEN.moe é um site feito por fãs que procura tocar música de Anime/Japonesa/Doujin 24/7
description.nl: LISTEN.moe is een door fans gemaakte website die 24/7 anime / Japanse / Doujin-muziek wil spelen
